subtitle: learning about the U.S.A through crafts & activities
title: Little hands celebrate America!
subjects: Creative activities and seat work -- Juvenile literature
United States -- Study and teaching (Preschool) -- Activity programs
United States -- Study and teaching (Primary) -- Activity programs
by_statement: by Jill Frankel Hauser ; illustrations by Michael Kune.

description.value: Easy crafts and activities like making crowns, Navajo bracelets, and a patchwork quilt, help introduce America's history, geography, symbols, and people.
